title: Set User Settings Send
description: Set User Settings (this call should be used in conjunction with get_settings)

phone.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Required field for real money account and within 8-35 digits, allowing '+' in front, numbers, hyphens or space.

tax_identification_number.description: Tax identification number. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

salutation.description: Accept any value in enum list (can only be changed on unauthenticated svg accounts).

first_name.description: Within 2-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes (can only be changed on unauthenticated svg accounts).

last_name.description: Within 2-50 characters, use only letters, spaces, hyphens, full-stops or apostrophes (can only be changed on unauthenticated svg accounts).

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth format: yyyy-mm-dd (can only be changed on unauthenticated svg accounts).

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response

email_consent.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating permission to use email address for any contact which may include marketing

residence.description: 2-letter country code. Note: not applicable for real money account. Only allow for Virtual account without residence set.

address_postcode.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Optional field for real money account.

tax_residence.description: Residence for tax purpose. Comma separated iso country code if multiple jurisdictions. Only applicable for real money account. Required for maltainvest landing company.

address_state.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Optional field for real money account.

allow_copiers.description: Boolean value 1 or 0, indicating permission to allow others to follow your trades. Note: not applicable for Virtual account. Only allow for real money account.

address_city.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Required field for real money account.

account_opening_reason.description: Purpose and reason for requesting the account opening. Only applicable for real money account. Required for clients that have not set it yet. Can only be set once.

address_line_1.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Required field for real money account.

address_line_2.description: Note: not applicable for virtual account. Optional field for real money account.

citizen.description: Country of legal citizenship, 2-letter country code.

secret_question.description: Accept any value in enum list. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client opens another account.

secret_answer.description: Answer to secret question, within 4-50 characters. Required for new account and existing client details will be used if client opens another account.

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

request_professional_status.description: Required when client wants to be treated as professional. Applicable for financial accounts only.
